rows.label: qst702403_msg0001
rows.name:
Wow... The soldiers of the
Iiran army are so cool.

rows.label: qst702403_msg0002
rows.name:
But the way the Drivers and
Blades fought when the Heaven's
Holy Grail attacked!

rows.label: qst702403_msg0004
rows.name:
...Hey, aren't you the
Drivers from the other day?!

rows.label: qst702403_msg0005
rows.name:
What? Am I interested
in the resistance?

rows.label: qst702403_msg0006
rows.name:
Well... I've always admired the Iiran
army and have been taking the entrance
exam for three years now.

rows.label: qst702403_msg0007
rows.name:
But after seeing you all in action,
I've been thinking that the
resistance might be nice too...

rows.label: qst702403_msg0008
rows.name: So, to be honest, I'm really torn.

rows.label: qst702403_msg0009
rows.name:
I can't give you an answer
right away, so could you
give me some time to think?

rows.label: qst702403_msg0010
rows.name:
It's alright. I know where
the resistance camp is.

rows.label: qst702403_msg0011
rows.name:
If I decide to join the resistance,
I just need to go there, right?

rows.label: qst702403_msg0101
rows.name:
Hmm, should I wait until next
year and take the Iiran army
entrance exam again...?

rows.label: qst702403_msg0102
rows.name:
Or should I decide now and
join the resistance...?

rows.label: qst702403_msg0103
rows.name: Ugh... This is a tough decision.

rows.label: qst702403_msg0104
rows.name:
If I decide to join the resistance,
I'll definitely go to the camp, so
please give me a little time to think.
